goals__remit:
The Association of Manufacturers and Formulators of Enzyme Products  - Amfep - is a non-profit European industry association created in 1977. 
 
Our mission is to contribute to a comprehensible and workable regulatory environment for enzymes, which the exception of pharmaceutical and dietary, which provides legal certainty to our members and our customers.
